children.name: total
children.description: The total number of stations with the specified plug

children.name: type
children.description: The charging speed type for the specified power

children.name: slow
children.description: Slow charging (below 43 kWh)

children.name: fast
children.description: Fast charging stations (above 43 kWh and below 150 kWh)

children.name: turbo
children.description: Ultra fast charging stations (above 150 kWh)

children.name: powers
children.description: The list of powers for the speed type

children.name: power
children.description: The maximum power the plug provides in kW

children.name: total
children.description: The total number of stations with the specified power

children.description: The amenity type
